DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Effect ALLN-177 Reducing Urinary Oxalate Patients With Secondary Hyperoxaluria Kidney Stones Over 28 Days
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo control study evaluate efficacy ALLN 177 compare placebo reduce urinary excretion oxalate subject secondary hyperoxaluria kidney stone . ALLN-177 orally administer form oxalate decarboxylase . The goal therapy ALLN-177 reduce urinary oxalate excretion decrease absorption oxalate gastrointestinal tract . Eligible subject randomize 28 day treatment ALLN-177 ( 7,500 unit ) placebo three time daily meal . Urinary oxalate excretion assess 24-hr urine collection throughout study . The study allow approximately 66 subject . The number enrol subject may increase maximum 100 follow interim analysis .
